title: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S) Now selectboth P1 and P2.
OB: In the Navigator, the options to open and close projects are not always available.
EB: Either both options should be available or neither should be enabled.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Create two projects, P1 and P2. 
2. Select project P2. 
3. Attempt to close project P2, observe the availability of the 'Close project' option.
